mapper.select: SELECT t.base_uid,t.customcode,t.customprocess,t.revokeresult,t.leasts,t.defedtdesc,t.claimtypes,s.status FROM spfs30_8d_sell t LEFT JOIN base_form s ON t.base_uid = s.base_uid WHERE t.leasts = #{leasts}

SELECT t.base_uid,t.customcode,t.customprocess,t.revokeresult,t.leasts,t.defedtdesc,t.claimtypes,t.model,s.status FROM spfs30_8d_sell t LEFT JOIN base_form s ON t.base_uid = s.base_uid WHERE t.base_uid = #{base_uid}
SELECT t.base_uid,t.standard_operation_code,t.operation_description,t.blame_content,t.blame_type FROM spfs30_8d_sell_blame_opers t WHERE t.base_uid = #{base_uid} AND t.blame_type = '产生工序'
SELECT t.base_uid,t.standard_operation_code,t.operation_description,t.blame_content,t.blame_type FROM spfs30_8d_sell_blame_opers t WHERE t.base_uid = #{base_uid} AND t.blame_type = '流出工序'
SELECT t.code_desc FROM sc.codes t WHERE t.code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND t.code_type = #{code_type} AND ROWNUM = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE spfs30_8d_sell SET defedtdesc=#{defedtdesc}, claimtypes=#{claimtypes}, customprocess=#{customprocess}, revokeresult=#{revokeresult}, model=#{model} WHERE base_uid = #{base_uid}
